title: INITIATION / ALCOHOL HABIT
description: A thought for becoming an alcoholic.

dialogueTree.title: Electrochemistry: "Well, hello. Someone seems to have..."
dialogueTree.text: Well, hello. Someone seems to have found himself a bottle of *alcohol*. Here's where the *magic* happens.

links.title: You: "Look at the bottle."
links.text: Look at the bottle.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Light reflects off the green glass..."
links.text: Light reflects off the green glass of the Commodore Red. The gods have been generous. Better pop it open before they change their minds...

links.title: Interfacing: "Wow, the gods of mass production ha..."
links.text: Wow, the gods of mass production have made this alcohol container *laughably* easy to open. A child could have done it.

links.title: Volition: "I don't know about this..."
links.text: I don't know about this...

links.title: You: "Open the bottle."
links.text: Open the bottle.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There's a satisfying pop as the cap..."
links.text: There's a satisfying pop as the cap comes off, and the hair on your back rises like an army at attention. You've been here before. Welcome back, detective. You're home now...

links.title: Inland Empire: "You see a flash of teeth -- a young..."
links.text: You see a flash of teeth -- a young woman smiling at you, near some railway overpass in your ruined past. She is gorgeous. And she is *yours*.

links.title: You: "What will be the repercussions if I..."
links.text: What will be the repercussions if I take that sip?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Nothing. Some *mental* stuff. Nothi..."
links.text: Nothing. Some *mental* stuff. Nothing to be worried about. Physically you'll be strong as an ox!

links.title: You: "Take a sip."
links.text: Take a sip.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "A golden sun melts down your throat..."
links.text: A golden sun melts down your throat, its rays filling your nostrils with sunshine. Your stomach melts from it -- into a happy gooey mess! So does your mind, all the bad things are melting. You're you again. A *real* cop. A real detective. *Incredibly* well done.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "From the void we came. And to the v..."
links.text: From the void we came. And to the void we must return!

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "In the bottom right corner of the s..."
links.text: In the bottom right corner of the screen there's an ALCOHOL button! ALCOHOL gives +1 to PHYSIQUE skills: Physical Instrument, Half Light, Electrochemistry, Endurance, Pain Threshold, and Shivers. This is good before rolling a White Check -- but damages your Morale. And remember...

links.text: A golden sun melts down your throat, its rays filling your nostrils with sunshine. Your stomach melts from it -- into a happy gooey mess! So does your mind, all the bad things are melting. You're you again. A *real* cop. A real detective. *Incredibly* well done.

links.title: You: "No. No. I'm not doing it. [Ignore t..."
links.text: No. No. I'm not doing it. [Ignore thought.]

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There's a satisfying pop as the cor..."
links.text: There's a satisfying pop as the cork jumps out, and the hair on your back rises like an army at attention. You've been here before. Welcome back, detective. You're home now...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There's a satisfying crack as the c..."
links.text: There's a satisfying crack as the cap comes off, and the hair on your back rises like an army at attention. You've been here before. Welcome back, detective. You're home now...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "There's a satisfying pop as the cap..."
links.text: There's a satisfying pop as the cap comes off, and the hair on your back rises like an army at attention. You've been here before. Welcome back, detective. You're home now...

links.title: You: "Should I though? I may have a teeny..."
links.text: Should I though? I may have a teeny-weeny heart attack problem.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Oh, yes. The chest pain and the diz..."
links.text: Oh, yes. The chest pain and the dizziness. You've *suffered* long enough -- now it's time to drink, to live.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Why is it always about *you*? *Your..."
links.text: Why is it always about *you*? *Your* heart problem? *Your* coronary artery? Think about *us*. We're in this together. You and your wacky tie of substance abuse! Do it for *us*! Pop it open.

links.title: You: "No. No. I'm not doing it. [Ignore t..."
links.text: No. No. I'm not doing it. [Ignore thought.]

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Fine. We're not worried... you'll c..."
links.text: Fine. We're not worried... you'll crawl back to this bottle soon enough. We'll give you another chance. Booze *always* gives you *another* chance.

links.title: Suggestion: "Yes, it's *merciful* that way. It's..."
links.text: Yes, it's *merciful* that way. It's your friend. Come back to it, we're all rooting for you to.

links.title: Volition: "Not *all* of us..."
links.text: Not *all* of us...

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "You've passed up your chance to sta..."
links.text: You've passed up your chance to start drinking ALCOHOL for now, but don't worry! The option to start drinking becomes available again in 2 hours.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Fine. We're not worried... you'll c..."
links.text: Fine. We're not worried... you'll crawl back to this bottle soon enough. We'll give you another chance. Booze *always* gives you *another* chance.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Light reflects off the thermal cup...."
links.text: Light reflects off the thermal cup. The borscht may not look like much, but doubtless it'll get the job done. Better pop it open before it gets cold...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Pale-aged vodka? This is rare game..."
links.text: Pale-aged vodka? This is rare game indeed. The gods have been generous. Better pop it open before they change their minds...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What a *solid* can of mass-produced..."
links.text: What a *solid* can of mass-produced piss water. Well over 10% alcohol in this so-called *beer*. Pop it open before it gets too warm...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The light reflects off this bottle..."
links.text: The light reflects off this bottle of sweet, sweet liquor -- a gift from above. The gods have been generous. Pop it open before they change their minds...

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Oh, no, you don't -- not this one...."
links.text: Oh, no, you don't -- not this one. That's not *you*. You...
